apis.label: APIs
apis.description: Servers that connect to blockchain and send transactions fast, and services to search, filter, and access structured blockchain data.

explorers.label: Explorers
explorers.description: Tools to view transactions, blocks, and addresses in real time.

oracles.label: Oracles
oracles.description: Services that bring external data into blockchain for smart contracts.

bridges.label: Bridges
bridges.description: Tools for transferring tokens and data across different blockchains.

services.label: Services
services.description: Development platforms, tools, and services for developers.

sdks.label: SDKs
sdks.description: SDKs, frameworks, and libraries for developers.

faucets.label: Faucets
faucets.description: Get free test tokens for development and test networks.

analytics.label: Analytics
analytics.description: Platforms to monitor blockchain data, metrics, and activity.

wallets.label: Wallets
wallets.description: Apps to store, send, and interact with tokens and DApps.

ramps.label: Ramps
ramps.description: On/off-ramp providers for fiat and crypto.
